page.title: 20Credits/Craignish (Domesday)
page.content:
Pupils at the school:- Daniel Gregory, Mark Hampton, Siobhan Healy, Tommy Hill, Julie MacLean, Charles Rentoul, John Sorensen-Jones, Gordon Wyllie.&Mrs.R. Edmonds(teacher)
Our thanks are due to the following:- Mr. N. Boase, Rev. R. Carmichael, Mr. C. Peterson, Mr. F. Tucker, Mr. D. Wilkie, Miss R. Dalgleish, & many other local residents,
Mrs. J. Matheson (for allowing us to use her official weather statistics),
Mrs. A. Campbell Pitt (for details of her observation of the birds in Ardfern),
Dr. J. Patrick (for sharing his knowledge of the fish in Loch Craignish).
